source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_SEQ_00<tab>With thoughts of Alphinaud's plight weighing heavy on her mind, Alisaie might welcome some company.
target: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_SEQ_00<tab>石の家のアリゼーは、アルフィノのことを案じているようだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_SEQ_01<tab>Since there is naught to be done but wait for word from her brother, Alisaie suggests you take the opportunity to have tea together. No one seems to be sitting at the nearby table, so why not claim it while you wait for the kettle to boil.
target: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_SEQ_01<tab>アリゼー、ヤ・シュトラと、一服することになった。レヴナンツトールの石の家にある「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EA97B01 /var>」に向かおう。

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_SEQ_02<tab>After a pleasant while spent chatting with your fellow Scions, you are joined by Thancred, who proceeds to share the fruits of his investigation into Zenos's missing remains. Ascian involvement seems all but certain at this point, and Thancred offers to infiltrate the Empire's western provinces to seek out further information. With Y'shtola's time already committed to a scholarly expedition to Doma, Alisaie reluctantly agrees to hold the fort at the Rising Stones.
target: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_SEQ_02<tab>3人で一服していたところ、サンクレッドが現れた。皆、アルフィノのことを案じているようだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_SEQ_03<tab>Your companions are poised to scatter to the winds once more. Alisaie stands by the entryway to the solar, a worried frown creasing her brow...
target: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_SEQ_03<tab>帝国に向かったアルフィノに思いを馳せた。ヤ・シュトラは蛮神研究のためドマへ、サンクレッドはゼノスの調査のため帝国属州へ、それぞれ、今後の動きを決めたようだ。アリゼーは、石の家に残ることになった。石の家の「アリゼー」と話そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_SEQ_04<tab>Promising to drop in and visit from time to time, you leave Alisaie to await word from Alphinaud. You can but pray that the light of the Crystal goes with him as he enters a realm steeped in Ascian shadow.
target: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_SEQ_04<tab>アリゼーはアルフィノからの連絡を待つようだ。アシエンの影が色濃い帝国へ向かったアルフィノの無事を祈り、いまは彼の朗報を待とう……。

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_SEQ_05<tab>
target: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_SEQ_05<tab>

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_YSHTOLA_100_000<tab>Alphinaud will have need of all his wits if he is to survive his visit to Garlemald. We know precious little about life in the imperial capital.
target:
TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_YSHTOLA_100_000<tab>アルフィノも無茶したものね……。
それが若さ……ということかしら？

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_ALISAIE_000_000<tab>It's been an eventful few days, hasn't it. But I suppose all we can do now is wait for word from Alphinaud.
target:
TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_ALISAIE_000_000<tab>さてと……いろいろと目まぐるしかったけど、
しばらくは、アルフィノからの連絡を待つことになるわね。

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_ALISAIE_000_001<tab>Hmph. I don't recall the last time I had nothing pressing to be getting on with... We should probably make the most of it. Shall I put on some tea?
target:
TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_ALISAIE_000_001<tab>せっかくだから、3人でひと息つかない？
情報共有がてら、お茶でもしましょうよ。

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_YSHTOLA_100_002<tab>Tea would be lovely. You may regale me with the tale of your adventures in the Far East─and of your encounter with this new primal especially.
target:
TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_YSHTOLA_100_002<tab>ええ、いいわね。
東方の土産話、ゆっくりと聞かせてもらうわ。
新たに召喚された蛮神も気になるところだし……。

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_ALISAIE_000_002<tab>
target: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_ALISAIE_000_002<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_ALISAIE_000_003<tab>I'll put the kettle on, then. That table looks free if you'd like to take a seat.
target:
TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_ALISAIE_000_003<tab>それじゃあ、用意するから、
そこの席で座っててね。

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_ALISAIE_000_005<tab>I'll take care of the tea─you can claim us a table.
target: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_ALISAIE_000_005<tab>お茶を淹れるから、そこの席で座っててね。

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_YSHTOLA_100_006<tab>It is pronounced “Tsu-ku-yo-mi,” correct? A figure from Far Eastern mythology, no doubt...
target:
TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_YSHTOLA_100_006<tab>ツクヨミ……だったかしら？
新たに召喚された蛮神の話を詳しく聞かせてちょうだい。

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_SYSTEM_100_010<tab>Upon sitting at the table, several cutscenes will play in sequence.
target:
TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_SYSTEM_100_010<tab>これより物語が大きく進展するため、
カットシーンが連続して再生されます。

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_SYSTEM_100_011<tab>It is recommended that you set aside sufficient time to view these scenes in their entirety.
target:
TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_SYSTEM_100_011<tab>しばらく時間がかかるため、
十分にプレイ時間を確保したうえで、
続きを進めることを、お勧めいたします。

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_SYSTEM_100_013<tab>In order to undertake this quest, you must be a Disciple of War or Magic of level 70 or above.
target:
TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_SYSTEM_100_013<tab>本クエストを進行するためには、
現在のクラス・ジョブが、レベル70以上の、
ファイター、もしくはソーサラーである必要があります。

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_Q1_100_012<tab>Sit at the table?
target: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_Q1_100_012<tab>席に座りますか？

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_YSHTOLA_000_010<tab>...Interesting. So this Tsukuyomi was summoned in much the same manner as Susano─via the medium of a sacred relic.
target:
TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_YSHTOLA_000_010<tab>……なるほど。
ツクヨミという蛮神も、スサノオと同じく、
「神器」によって召喚されたものだったのね。

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_ALISAIE_100_010<tab>That's right. They believe their gods─or kami─reside in physical objects.
target:
TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_ALISAIE_100_010<tab>ええ、そうなの。
東方には八百万の神が物に宿るという、
エオルゼアとはまったく別の信仰があるのよ。

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_YSHTOLA_000_011<tab>Given the danger they represent, it may behoove us to begin a catalog of such relics. But if we are to contain the threat, we will require a better understanding of the summoning method itself. I believe I shall pay a visit to Doma, and learn what I can on the subject.
target:
TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_YSHTOLA_000_011<tab>「神器」による神降ろしは新たな脅威ね。
既知の召喚方法とは、方法論が異なるだけに情報が少なすぎる。
今後のためにも、私がドマへ向かって調査しておくわ。

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_ALISAIE_000_014<tab>A fine idea. And I know for a fact that our friends in Doma would be grateful for any information which could help to prevent further summoning in the region.
target:
TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_ALISAIE_000_014<tab>助かるわ。
対策を迫られているドマの人々にとっても、
神器の研究は有意義のはず……。

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_ALISAIE_100_014<tab>I will pen you a letter of introduction─Lord Hien will wish to welcome our resident expert on aetherology.
target:
TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_ALISAIE_100_014<tab>エーテル学に詳しいヤ・シュトラなら適任よ。
後で、私からヒエンへの紹介状を書いて渡すわ。

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_THANCRED_000_013<tab>Greetings! Could it be that I'm in time for tea?
target: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_THANCRED_000_013<tab>情報共有は終わってしまったかい？

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_ALISAIE_000_018<tab>It certainly looks that way. Come on─sit down and tell us how your investigations went.
target:
TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_ALISAIE_000_018<tab>あらかたは、ね。
それで、ゼノスの遺体に関する調査は終わったの？
今お茶を淹れるから、結果を聞かせてもらえて？

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_THANCRED_000_015<tab>After you left, I went about questioning Bloodhowe's gravekeepers. They all told much the same story: once Lyse and her officers had confirmed Zenos dead, his corpse was interred under strict supervision.
target:
TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_THANCRED_000_015<tab>あれから、ゼノスを埋葬した墓守に聞き込みをしてきた。
リセたちアラミゴ解放軍による死亡確認の後、
ヤツの遺体は確実に埋葬したとのことだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_THANCRED_000_016<tab>There seems little reason to doubt their testimony on that point, but when I mentioned the defacement of Zenos's grave, accounts grew rather more vague.
target:
TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_THANCRED_000_016<tab>複数の証言から、埋葬の事実には何ら疑うべき点はない。
だが、リセが言ってたとおり、ゼノスの墓は一度、
荒らされたことがあり、墓石がひどく汚されていたという。

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_THANCRED_000_017<tab>None reported having seen any suspicious persons in the vicinity, and all assumed the act to have been perpetrated by a vengeful Ala Mhigan. Crucially, however, I was able to confirm that when the offending scrawl was removed, as per Lyse's instruction, no one involved thought to check the contents of the coffin. By that stage, 'tis like that the corpse was already missing.
target:
TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_THANCRED_000_017<tab>墓守は、奴に恨みを持つ者の犯行だろうと意に介さず、
墓石の汚れを落としただけで、棺の中までは見なかったそうだ。
おそらく、遺体がなくなったのはそのときだろう。

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_THANCRED_100_017<tab>Assuming Zenos has not, in fact, risen from the dead, we are left with two possibilities: either the body was disposed of to lend credence to the claims of an extremely committed impostor, or an Ascian has taken up residence within it.
target:
TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_THANCRED_100_017<tab>となれば、可能性はふたつ……。
遺体を処分した上で、影武者を立てて生存を演出しているか、
それとも本当に、死の底から蘇ったのか……。

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_YSHTOLA_000_019<tab>If Asahi was as fervent a devotee as you believe, he would not have been fooled by an impersonation, however committed. We must assume that we are dealing with an Ascian, and proceed accordingly.
target:
TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_YSHTOLA_000_019<tab>アサヒとかいう熱烈な信奉者が面会した上で、
本物だと疑いもしなかったのなら、前者の可能性は低いわ。
やはり、アシエンの介在を考えるべきでしょうね。

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_THANCRED_000_020<tab>Agreed. The question is, how many <var 1A 02 /var>more<var 1A 01 /var> such monsters are waiting for Alphinaud in Garlemald?
target:
TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_THANCRED_000_020<tab>かつて、俺はアシエンに乗っ取られて操られた。
またアシエンが、遺体に憑依した例も報告されている。
アルフィノの向かった先は、そんな連中が巣喰う場所ということだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_ALISAIE_000_021<tab>Their presence was his chief reason for going. He understood the risks. I only hope he did not underestimate the extent of the infestation...
target:
TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_ALISAIE_000_021<tab>アルフィノは……すべてを覚悟の上で向かったわ。
だから、私も引き留めることができなかった。
無事でいてくれればいいけど、今頃どうしているのかな……。

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_SYSTEM_000_030<tab>Meanwhile, on the Imperial Hypersonic Assault Craft L-XXV...
target: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_SYSTEM_000_030<tab>一方 帝国軍高速魔導駆逐艇L-XXV・艦橋――

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_MAXIMA_000_031<tab>Master Alphinaud, we are making good speed towards our destination. Is aught amiss?
target:
TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_MAXIMA_000_031<tab>アルフィノさん。
航行は順調そのものですよ、どうしました？

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_ALPHINAUD_000_032<tab>Nay, 'tis just...I can see naught from my cabin, and was curious to know the land over which we flew.
target:
TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_ALPHINAUD_000_032<tab>船室からは外が見えないもので……
今、どのあたりを？

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_MAXIMA_000_033<tab>Ah. I am afraid our military craft are built with little thought for such niceties. I am happy to indulge your curiosity, however. We are presently passing over the Burn on the western edge of Othard. Even with the benefit of a porthole, your gaze would have been greeted with naught but malms upon malms of lifeless earth.
target:
TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_MAXIMA_000_033<tab>軍用艦ですから、見晴らしについてはご勘弁を……。
現在はオサード小大陸の西端、永久焦土地帯の上空です。
たとえ船室に窓があっても、見えるのは延々と続く荒野だけですよ。

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_ALPHINAUD_000_034<tab>I have read something of the Burn. It was described as a desolate wasteland, bled dry of every last drop of aether...
target:
TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_ALPHINAUD_000_034<tab>永久焦土地帯……確か文献によれば、
環境エーテルが極端に枯渇し、荒廃した土地だとか……。

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_MAXIMA_000_035<tab>Aye. It is believed that a succession of eikon summonings was responsible.
target:
TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_MAXIMA_000_035<tab>ええ、古の昔、相次いで神降ろしが行われた結果、
焦土と化した場所と考えられています。

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_MAXIMA_000_036<tab>When Emperor Solus first came to Othard and beheld this blight, he is said to have reeled at the scale of the devastation. He declared eikons a threat to our very star's existence, and issued an Empire-wide decree ordering the eradication of all such entities.
target:
TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_MAXIMA_000_036<tab>ガレマール帝国の初代皇帝、ソル帝は東州遠征の道中にて、
この地を直にご覧になり、星を蝕む脅威を認識……
蛮神討滅を国是に掲げたと言われています。

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_MAXIMA_000_037<tab>Hngh! Report!
target: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_MAXIMA_000_037<tab>何事か！？

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_IMPERIALPILOT_000_038<tab>We're under attack, sir! Magitek armor─no visible designation.
target:
TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_IMPERIALPILOT_000_038<tab>所属不明の飛行型魔導アーマーが飛来……
攻撃を受けています！

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_ALPHINAUD_000_039<tab>Magitek!? But who─?
target: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_ALPHINAUD_000_039<tab>魔導アーマーだって！？

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_ALPHINAUD_000_040<tab>Aaah!
target: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_ALPHINAUD_000_040<tab>うわっ！

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_MAXIMA_000_041<tab>All cannons, return fire! Damage report!
target:
TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_MAXIMA_000_041<tab>被害状況を確認！
各砲座、各個の判断で迎撃を……！

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_IMPERIALPILOT_000_042<tab>The main reactor's been hit! Helm unresponsive! We're going down, sir!
target:
TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_IMPERIALPILOT_000_042<tab>メイン魔導炉に被弾！
ダメです……制御不能！　墜落します！

source:
TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_MAXIMA_000_043<tab>Damn it! They knew exactly where to hit us.
All hands─brace for impact!
target:
TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_MAXIMA_000_043<tab>馬鹿な、我が艦の弱点を知っているとでも……！？
……ええい、総員、衝撃に備えろッ！！

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_MAXIMA_000_044<tab>Glad to have you back, Master Alphinaud. We have landed in one piece─more or less.
target:
TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_MAXIMA_000_044<tab>気付きましたね、アルフィノさん。
ご安心を、どうにか不時着しました。

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_MAXIMA_000_045<tab>But the air filtration system is damaged, and the ship is filling with smoke. We must gather the survivors and get out while we still can.
target:
TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_MAXIMA_000_045<tab>ですが、換気システムが停止し、煙が回ってきています。
ひとまず、生存者とともに艦の外に脱出しましょう。

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_ALPHINAUD_000_046<tab>Aye... Aye.
target: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_ALPHINAUD_000_046<tab>あ、ああ……了解です。

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_SYSTEM_000_050<tab>
target: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_SYSTEM_000_050<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_SYSTEM_000_051<tab>
target: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_SYSTEM_000_051<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_SYSTEM_000_052<tab>
target: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_SYSTEM_000_052<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_SYSTEM_000_053<tab>
target: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_SYSTEM_000_053<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_SYSTEM_000_054<tab>
target: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_SYSTEM_000_054<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_ALPHINAUD_000_060<tab>Confound it! Not here. Not like this!
target: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_ALPHINAUD_000_060<tab>くっ……こんな場所で、やられてたまるものかッ！

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_MAXIMA_000_061<tab>Wha─? Who in the Emperor's name─?
target: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_MAXIMA_000_061<tab>な、何者……！？

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_ALPHINAUD_000_062<tab>Enemies of our enemies. Introductions can wait!
target:
TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_ALPHINAUD_000_062<tab>ともかく敵の敵というなら、今は味方と考えましょう。
彼らと連携して、敵部隊を撃退するんです！

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_MAXIMA_000_063<tab>You are calm in a crisis, Master Alphinaud. Let us finish this, then!
target:
TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_MAXIMA_000_063<tab>肝が据わっていますね……。
わかりました、やってやりましょう！

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_ALPHINAUD_000_070<tab>My thanks. Your intervention proved most timely.
target:
TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_ALPHINAUD_000_070<tab>どなたかは存じませんが、助かりました。
援護に感謝します。

source:
TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_SHADOWHUNTER_000_071<tab>(-Menacing Mercenary-)Well, well...
I did not think to meet an Eorzean in this place, let alone a Scion.
target:
TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_SHADOWHUNTER_000_071<tab>(-ガンブレード使いの男-)驚くべき運命か……。
かような場所で、エオルゼア人……
しかも、あの「暁」の一員と巡り会うとは。

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_ALPHINAUD_000_072<tab>You know of me, sir?
target: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_ALPHINAUD_000_072<tab>私を知っておられる、と？

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_SHADOWHUNTER_000_073<tab>(-Menacing Mercenary-)I have some small...history with your order.
target: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_SHADOWHUNTER_000_073<tab>(-ガンブレード使いの男-)少しばかり因縁がな……。

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_SHADOWHUNTER_000_074<tab>(-Menacing Mercenary-)But I would speak of the present. Know you your assailants? And the severity of your predicament?
target:
TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_SHADOWHUNTER_000_074<tab>(-ガンブレード使いの男-)では、こちらも問おう。
うぬらは己が置かれた状況を理解しているか？

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_MAXIMA_000_075<tab>The soldiers bore the insignia of the Emperor's personal guard...
target:
TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_MAXIMA_000_075<tab>……倒した敵兵の軍装には、皇帝親衛軍の記章がありました。
つまり、皇帝陛下あるいは皇位継承者の、
不興を買ったということ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_ALPHINAUD_000_076<tab>And I could venture a guess as to their motive. But you yet have us at a disadvantage, sir─will you not tell us who you are?
target:
TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_ALPHINAUD_000_076<tab>その背後にある事情も、憶測であれば少しは……
しかし、あなた方はいったい？

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_SHADOWHUNTER_000_077<tab>(-Menacing Mercenary-)Our names are not yours for the asking. And as for our purpose...let this be your answer.
target: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_SHADOWHUNTER_000_077<tab>(-ガンブレード使いの男-)これが、その問いの答えとなろう……。

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_ALPHINAUD_000_078<tab>An Ascian mask!
target: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_ALPHINAUD_000_078<tab>こ、この仮面は……！

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_SHADOWHUNTER_000_079<tab>(-Menacing Mercenary-)The face of our prey.
target:
TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_SHADOWHUNTER_000_079<tab>(-ガンブレード使いの男-)そうだ。
我らは、アシエンと戦う者……。

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_SHADOWHUNTER_000_080<tab>(-Menacing Mercenary-)We must away before more arrive. Come with us or stay, but make your choice now.
target: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_SHADOWHUNTER_000_080<tab>(-ガンブレード使いの男-)さて、我らは行くが、どうする？

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_MAXIMA_000_081<tab>Even should we manage the long trek out of the Burn and secure passage to the capital, we would no doubt be greeted by the Emperor's guard...
target:
TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_MAXIMA_000_081<tab>仮にこの焦土を越えて長き旅の末、帝都に辿り着いたとしても、
待っているのは、皇帝親衛軍の歓迎でしょうからね……。

source:
TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_ALPHINAUD_000_082<tab>Indeed.
We accept your gracious offer, uh...
target:
TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_ALPHINAUD_000_082<tab>受け入れてくださるのなら、同行を希望しますが、
ええと…………

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_SHADOWHUNTER_000_083<tab>(-Shadowhunter-)“Shadowhunter” will suffice for the present.
target: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_SHADOWHUNTER_000_083<tab>(-影の狩人-)今はただ、影の狩人とでも名乗っておくとしよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_SHADOWHUNTER_100_083<tab>(-Shadowhunter-)Come.
target:
TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_SHADOWHUNTER_100_083<tab>(-影の狩人-)来るがいい、民衆派の将校……。
そして、「暁」の少年よ。

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_ALISAIE_000_090<tab>Ugh, this is intolerable. But as much as I wish it were otherwise, there is nothing we can do for Alphinaud now but pray for his success.
target:
TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_ALISAIE_000_090<tab>ああ、もう嫌になるわ。
なにもできずに、アルフィノのことを考えて、
悶々とするなんて……。

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_THANCRED_000_091<tab>Well...that is not <var 1A 02 /var>entirely<var 1A 01 /var> true.
target: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_THANCRED_000_091<tab>それぞれの役割ってものがあるさ。

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_THANCRED_100_091<tab>While your brother journeys to Garlemald from the east, I could make my way there from Ala Mhigo and find out what there is to be learned in the Empire's western provinces.
target:
TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_THANCRED_100_091<tab>そんな訳で、俺も俺で役割を果たすとするか……。
アルフィノが覚悟を決めて、東から帝都を目指したのなら、
俺は西から帝国の属州を探るとしよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_ALISAIE_000_092<tab>Then I'm coming with you! I can't very well sit here sipping tea if there's action to be taken!
target:
TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_ALISAIE_000_092<tab>それなら、私も連れてって！
私だってここで、じっとなんてしていられないもの……！

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_THANCRED_000_093<tab>Forgive me, Alisaie, but the provinces are hostile territory, and stealth is all important. It is safer that I go alone.
target:
TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_THANCRED_000_093<tab>いや、向かうのは属州とはいえ帝国領だ。
潜入術を身に付けた俺ひとりの方が身軽でいい。

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_ALISAIE_000_094<tab>I can sneak well enough when the situation demands it! Don't patronize me!
target: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_ALISAIE_000_094<tab>足手まといになんてならないから……お願い！

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say to Alisaie?
target: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_Q1_000_000<tab>アリゼーに何と言う？

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_A1_000_001<tab>We should leave this to Thancred.
target: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_A1_000_001<tab>サンクレッドに任せよう

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_A1_000_002<tab>I'll go with him.
target: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_A1_000_002<tab>自分が行こう

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_ALISAIE_100_094<tab>Not you too.
target: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_ALISAIE_100_094<tab>そ、そんな……。

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_YSHTOLA_000_095<tab>I understand your frustration, Alisaie, but <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> has the right of it. We must defer to Thancred's expertise in this matter.
target:
TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_YSHTOLA_000_095<tab>アリゼー、気持ちはわかるけれど、
ここは、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>の言うとおりよ。
専門家のサンクレッドに任せた方が無難だわ。

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_ALISAIE_200_094<tab>And how exactly would that be any better?
target: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_ALISAIE_200_094<tab>私の代わりにあなたが行くと言うの……？

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_THANCRED_100_093<tab>Ahem. I must refuse your company as well, my friend. Formidable though you are, the success of my mission depends on moving unnoticed, and lest you forget, you have grown rather <var 1A 02 /var>famous<var 1A 01 /var>. I trust you understand...
target:
TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_THANCRED_100_093<tab>悪いが、今回ばかりはお前にも待っててもらおう。
諜報は目立たないことが重要なんでね、
とにかく、ひとりの方が都合がいいんだ……わかってくれ。

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_ALISAIE_100_095<tab><sigh> ...Fine. Just promise you'll be careful.
target:
TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_ALISAIE_100_095<tab>……わかったわ。
でも、くれぐれも気をつけてね……。

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_THANCRED_000_095<tab>Well, I had best put on my skulking boots. There will be no room for mistakes once I've crossed the border from Ala Mhigo.
target:
TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_THANCRED_000_095<tab>さてと、そうと決まれば、さっそく準備といくか。
アラミゴから国境地帯を越えるとなると、大事だからな。

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_YSHTOLA_000_096<tab>Alisaie and her brother bicker as all siblings do, but she worries for him nonetheless. 'Twould be a kindness if you were to visit from time to time, and distract her from her cares.
target:
TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_YSHTOLA_000_096<tab>アリゼーは、アルフィノのことで、心穏やかじゃないみたい。
何だかんだ言って、仲のいい兄妹ってことよ。
また折を見て、様子を見に来てあげてちょうだい。

source:
TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_ALISAIE_000_100<tab>It seems that praying is to be the extent of my contribution after all.
...But I will stay behind, as I have been bid.
target:
TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_ALISAIE_000_100<tab>結局、私は祈ることしかできないけど、
サンクレッドとアルフィノ、ふたりの連絡を待つことにするわ。

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_THANCRED_000_101<tab>We all have our talents. Mine just happen to involve a silver tongue and soft soles. I promise to send word the moment I learn aught of consequence.
target:
TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_THANCRED_000_101<tab>適材適所ってことさ。
何かわかり次第、連絡するから気長に待っていてくれ。
じゃあな！

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_YSHTOLA_000_102<tab>See that you notify me too. I mean to depart for Doma as soon as I find a suitable East Aldenard vessel to bear me thither, but I shall return if I am needed.
target:
TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_YSHTOLA_000_102<tab>さて、私もドマに向けて出発しなくちゃ。
東アルデナード商会の商船にでも、便乗させてもらうわ。
何かあったら、連絡してちょうだい。

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_ALISAIE_000_103<tab>Be sure to drop in whenever you're next in the area, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. With any luck, I'll have a painfully detailed report from Alphinaud to share.
target:
TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_ALISAIE_000_103<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、また顔を出してね。
そのときは、きっと朗報が届いているはずだから……。

source: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_SYSTEM_100_104<tab>You have learned the emote <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Ponder<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!
target: TEXT_STMBDD107_03076_SYSTEM_100_104<tab>エモートアクション「表情：空想」を覚えた！
